help_command_rules: Display the latest group rules configured by admins.
register_usage: Use `/register <wallet_address> <token_symbol>` to start tracking a token.
register_missing_token: Please include both the wallet address and the token symbol (example: `/register 0xabc... BANMAO`).
wallet_overview_empty: You haven't linked any Xlayer wallets yet.
wallet_overview_footer: Real-time balances will be refreshed automatically.
rules_private_hint: Use this command inside a group to view its rules.
rules_not_configured: Admins have not published group rules yet.
admin_action_group_only: This admin command only works inside groups.
admin_action_no_permission: Only group admins can run this command.
admin_action_missing_args: Please provide additional parameters for this command.
admin_mute_invalid: Reply to the member or provide a numeric user ID to mute.
admin_warn_invalid: Reply to the member or provide a numeric user ID to warn.
admin_warn_success: Warning saved for {user}. Total warnings: {count}. Reason: {reason}
admin_rules_missing: Reply with the rule content or include it after the command.
admin_blacklist_missing: Provide a keyword to update the blacklist.
admin_set_xp_invalid: Please provide a valid member and XP amount.
admin_draw_no_candidates: No eligible members for a giveaway yet.
admin_review_memes_empty: No memes are waiting for review.
admin_announce_missing: Provide the announcement text or reply to a message.
admin_track_invalid: Provide a valid wallet address to track.
admin_action_error: Unable to execute the admin command.
